A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst film I have seen in a long long time. The whole movie is full inconsistencies\, plot holes and character assassination. The movie breaks the pre established rules setup by Star Wars franchise and The Force Awakens. It even breaks its own rules. It  is very lacking in continuity. The tone is all over the place. The comedy is inserted in inappropriate moments. It sounds like a fanfiction brought to screen and a very bad one at that. I am very disappointed that this movie has been released as a part of my beloved franchise.
